                throws JSON.JSONFormatException
        Converts a JSON string to a TCN object
        Parameters:
        string - The JSON string, supports most compact and readable formats
        Returns:
        The parsed TCN object
        Throws:
        JSON.JSONFormatException - If a format error is found
